description: The Canyonland collection is the ultimate in land-to-water versatility and protection. Made to go where you go – from land to lake and back again – this lightweight, breathable, always-ready sneaker includes our removable LUVSEAT™ arch support. Two types of traction are designed to give you grip on land and in water, while the outsole and protective mesh give you the versatility to quickly move between the two. Super quick drying to keep your feet comfortable, this shoe is designed to trek (or dive) into adventure.
name: Chaco Canyonland - Mens
